submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        freq = defaultdict(SortedList)
        n = len(nums)
        u = SortedList()
        for i in range(n//2):
            x = abs(nums[i] - nums[n-i-1])
            freq[x].add(max(k-min(nums[i], nums[n-i-1]), max(nums[i], nums[n-i-1])))
            u.add(max(k-min(nums[i], nums[n-i-1]), max(nums[i], nums[n-i-1])))
        # print(freq, u)
        ans = 10**10
        for i in range(k+1):
            add_two = u.bisect_right(i-1)
            add_one = n//2 - add_two
            add_two -= freq[i].bisect_right(i-1)
            add_one -= (len(freq[i]) - freq[i].bisect_right(i-1))
            ans = min(ans, add_two * 2 + add_one)
            # print(i, add_two, add_one)

        return ans
"""
